EGGmeasures_Metadata.Description: gastric metrics computed from electrogastrography recording in Visceral Mind Project

notes.Description: notes of rejection or details of channel

mean_power_norm.Description: mean power in the normogastria range

prop_power_norm.Description: proportion of power in normogastria range with respect to power in all gastric ranges = sum(power_normrange)/sum(power_allgastriarange)

mean_power_ratio_norm.Description: mean power ratio in normogastria range = mean(power_normrange)/(mean(power_bradyrange)+mean(power_normrange)+mean(power_tachyrange))

SD_cycle_dur_norm.Description: standard deviation of cycle durations in normogastria (2-4 cpm = 15-30 seconds = 0.03-0.07 Hz)

prop_norm_cycles.Description: proportion of cycle lengths that are normogastric

mean_cycle_dur_norm.Description: mean gastric cycle duration after filtering EGG data around the peak normogastria frequency

limits_3std_norm_1.Description: lower limit of 3 standard deviations from mean_cycle_dur_norm

limits_3std_norm_2.Description: lower limit of 3 standard deviations from mean_cycle_dur_norm
